name: AppsCore
description: We take you from concept and design, to development and launch, to help you discover, refine, realise and market your big idea. We’ll generate everything from the overall digital strategy to an intuitive design that puts UX first, combining them in a versatile, rigorously tested platform. Post-launch, our marketing team will work hard to measure and increase the app’s impact on your customers and your business, driving interest and sales. ​
